Retain.

Deal 13 (17) damage.

Deal 14 (17) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: All For Nothing
cards.description:
Retain. Exhaust your hand (, then draw a card).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloom
cards.description:
Discard the top 2 (4) cards from your draw pile.
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Brain Feeder
cards.description:
Gain 16 (20) block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, add 1 Dream to your discard pile.

cards.name: Darkening Mind
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Nightmare, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Deeper Sleep
cards.description: (Add a Dream to your discard pile. ) Whenever you draw a Dream, gain 2 Dexterity.

Add X Dreams to your discard pile ( 2 times).

cards.name: Extract
cards.description:
Apply 5 (7) Poison X times.
Draw a (X) card (cards).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Happy Thoughts
cards.description:
Apply 2 (3) Weak.
Discard a card.

Whenever you draw this card, exhaust it and draw 2 cards.

Ethereal.

Ethereal.

cards.name: Pour It Out

cards.name: Racing Thoughts
cards.description: Deal 0 damage. Whenever you draw this card, increase its damage by 5 (7).

Retain.
Exhaust ALL Nightmares in your hand. Gain 7 block for each card exhausted this way.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Relive
cards.description:
Shuffle 2 (3) copies into your draw pile of the next card you play this turn.
Shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Remember
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Put a card from your exhaust pile on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shimmering Veil
cards.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next 5 (8) turns.

cards.name: Shower Thought
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to your Block.
Gain 8 (11) block.

cards.name: Sickening Swathe
cards.description:
Apply 6 (8) Poison to ALL enemies.
Shuffle a Nightmare into your draw pile.

cards.name: Sleeping Body

cards.name: Stimulus

Deal 7 damage.
If the target is attacking, add a Nightmare to your draw pile ( and a Dream to your discard pile).

cards.name: Time Compression
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Gain [G] for each Nightmare in your hand.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Unthought Known
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Whenevever you exhaust this card, permanently increase its damage by 2 (4).

Whenever you draw this card, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
Deal 7 (10) damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Amnausea

Exhaust ALL cards in your hand.
Apply 2 (3) Poison to ALL enemies for each Exhausted card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Damping
cards.description:
Ethereal.
All enemies lose 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Galaxy Brain
cards.description: Whenever you play a Dream, exhaust ALL cards in your hand.

cards.name: Ignorance
cards.description:
Whenever you exhaust a card this turn,
gain [G].
You cannot draw additional cards this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Inspiration
cards.description: Gain [G]  and draw a card for each Nightmare in your hand.~~-  Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Lose Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, play a ~~- random  -~~ card from your discard pile and exhaust it.

cards.name: Lost Mind
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain [G] and add a Nightmare to your draw pile.

cards.name: Lucidity
cards.description: At the end of your turn, add 1 Dream to your discard pile. All cards exhaust when played.

cards.name: Mindlessness

cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~

Exhaust.

cards.name: New Dawn
cards.description:
Retain.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Night Haunts

Exhaust.

cards.name: Reinterpret

Draw 3 cards.
Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Ruthless Study

Add a (an)  (upgraded ) Dream and Nightmare to your hand. Apply 1 Vulnerable to yourself.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unburden

(Retain.)

cards.name: Withdraw

relics.name: Dream Journal
relics.description: Whenever you rest at a campsite, raise your Max HP by 2 and upgrade a random card in your deck.

relics.name: Memory House
relics.description: At the beginning of combat, add 2 Dreams to your discard pile.
relics.flavorText: A place to keep them safe.

relics.name: Memoir of Another
relics.description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card of another color to your deck. If you have a 'Dream Catcher', add a Somnambulant card to the options and upgrade them.
relics.flavorText: Proper literature for a dream out of bounds.

relics.name: Runic Strip
relics.description: Whenever an enemy gains strength, gain 3 Mental Barrier.
relics.flavorText: Infinite objects can be somewhat tiring.

relics.name: Sleeping Pills
relics.description: Cards created from Dreams cost 0 until end of combat.

relics.name: Cipher's Pen
relics.description: Whenever you create a Dream or Nightmare, upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: The pen writes its meaning true.

relics.name: Private Pocket
relics.description: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain 1 Mental Barrier.
relics.flavorText: Everyone has the right to their private pocket.

relics.name: Broken Timepiece
relics.description: Whenever a Dream is exhausted, gain 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Trust no other to wake you but a working timepiece.

relics.name: Glued Mask
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] . At the beginning of combat, add 2 Nightmares to your draw pile. Nightmares can not be played.
relics.flavorText: It helps you see things as they should be.

relics.name: Dementing Veil
relics.description: At the end of your turn, exhaust all cards in your hand.

potions.name: Bottled Dream
potions.description: Add a Dream to your hand.

keywords.name: Mental barrier
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain block equal to your Mental Barrier, then reduce your Mental Barrier by 1.

mods.name: Somnambulant
mods.description:
This mod adds a new character to the game, the Somnambulant. They dream, and their dreams are the stuff of nightmares. 
 
 The Somnambulant has many ways of manipulating their deck, which can change drastically in the course of combat. Cards can be generated and exhausted en masse. It is up to the player to reshape their decks in beneficial ways. 
 The most common way of changing the deck comes in the form of two special cards, both of which can only be created during combat. 
 The card Dream will create new cards until your hand is full, all of which cost 0 energy this turn. The class of the cards generated depends on the intent of the enemy you are dreaming about: an attacking enemy will provide you with Ironclad cards, a buffing enemy with Defect cards, and a debuffing enemy with Silent cards. Dreams are powerful, but, since they are generated in your discard pile, will often take a while to get drawn. 
 The card Nightmare does very little on its own. It is practically a curse, allowing you to apply 1 measly poison to an enemy, for the ungainly cost of 1 energy. They stay in your hand at the end of your turn, so at least you only have to draw them once. However, fill up your hand with too many Nightmares and there will be little space for those Dreams to pay off. Mostly, Nightmares are a drawback to an otherwise powerful effect. There are cards, however, that let you benefit from those Nightmares in your hand. 
 
 The rest is up to you to discover.
